name: Skyborne
description:
Hurry up, you need to escape!

After a terrible ecological catastrophe has happened in the Blobby World, the only surviving chance you have  is to escape to the Land Above!

Quickly jump on platforms and crush any enemy you might encounter, to assure yourself a new life above the clouds. Be careful, something might be following you...

HOW TO PLAY

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump

P - Pause the game

E - ...It is a surprise ;)

If you like the game, please leave a comment down below, it would be really appreciated! :3

Small game made in a week by a team of five people.

Producer: Rosie_Mable

Technical Lead: Peter Champion

Creative Lead: Joe McGrath

Artistic Lead: Tom Bradstreet

QA Lead and Sounds Designer: Tyler Streeter
